bibl.title: Archaic and Classical Choral Song. Performance, Politics and Dissemination
bibl.note: Most of the papers stem from the international conference 'Archaic and Classical Choral Song' held in May 24-27, 2007, at the Rethymnon campus of the University of Crete. - 17 contributions. - Pp. v-vi: Foreword; - 503-564: Index.
bibl.seg: Lucia Athanassaki & Ewen Lyall Bowie (edd.), Archaic and Classical Choral Song. Performance, Politics and Dissemination = Trends in Classics. Supplementary Volumes. 10.
Berlin - New York, W. de Gruyter, 2011, 8°, viii-564 pp. ISBN 978-3-11-025402-0. €119,95.

Most of the papers stem from the international conference 'Archaic and Classical Choral Song' held in May 24-27, 2007, at the Rethymnon campus of the University of Crete. - 17 contributions. - Pp. v-vi: Foreword; - 503-564: Index.
